select db, mname, birth ,md, dn, age, gender, oper, rrn, docname, case when md = '(01) 내과' then '내과' when md = '(02) 정형외과' then '정형외과' when md = '(03) 이비인후과' then '이비인후과' when md = '(04) 산부인과' then '산부인과' when md = '(05) 피부과' then '피부과' when md = '(06) 소아과' then '소아과' end as 'speciality',
(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(disease, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(disease, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(disease, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS disease,
(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(modi, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(modi, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(modi, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS modi,

(CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(exitd, '%y-%m-%d' ), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(exitd, '%y-%m-%d'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(exitd, '%y-%m-%d'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS exitd
